channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13609] Fix UDTFs to allow local fetch task to fetch rows forwarded by GenericUDTF.close()
item.description: From ashutoshc's comments in HIVE-13586, attempt to fix whatever is causing the local fetch task to not get the rows forwarded by UDTF close().
item.summary: Fix UDTFs to allow local fetch task to fetch rows forwarded by GenericUDTF.close()

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Not totally sure if this is the right way to do it, but we basically need to close the fetch task's operator before the fetch task is totally done retrieving rows.
ashutoshc can you take a look?
jdere Can you create a RB for this?

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12800693/HIVE-13609.1.patch

ERROR: -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.TestCheckPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.PrepPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ExecutionPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ReportingPhase
Tests exited with: TestsFailedException: 63 tests failed

This message is automatically generated.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12800693 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build

Took a look at the new unit test failures. TestDbNotificationListener, TestJdbcWithDBTokenStore, TestLlapTaskCommunicator, TestSparkClient all pass locally on my Mac. Had trouble running TestMiniSparkOnYarnCliDriver, but those tests passed on my Linux VM, plus those same TestMiniSparkOnYarnCliDriver tests are showing up as failed on the next precommit run, so it looks like these failures are not related to the patch.

I will commit this patch in the morning.
